paper_abstract: In this paper, we construct two classes of new quantum maximum-distance-separable (MDS) codes with parameters [[q(2)-1/4, q(2)-1/4 - 2d + 2, d]](q), where q is an odd prime power with q = 3 (mod 4) and 2 <= d <= 3q-1/4; [[8(q - 1), 8(q - 1) - 2d + 2, d]](q), where q is an odd prime power with the form q = 8t - 1 (t is an even positive integer) and 2 <= d <= q+15/2. Comparing the parameters with all known quantum MDS codes, the quantum MDS codes exhibited here have minimum distances bigger than the ones available in the literature.
